title: Heads or Tails : ANDROID WEAR

description: Using modern science, we have created the most technologically-advanced coin simulation ever to run on a watch. There's a 50/50 chance you'll love Heads or Tails!FEATURES- Heads!- Tails!- Incredible coin-flipping action!- Streak counter! Who can defy the odds the longest!?- Also sex.
descriptionHTML:
Using modern science, we have created the most technologically-advanced coin simulation ever to run on a watch. There's a 50/50 chance you'll love Heads or Tails!

FEATURES
- Heads!
- Tails!
- Incredible coin-flipping action!
- Streak counter! Who can defy the odds the longest!?

- Also sex.
comments: Boo There are way better ones
Useless for intended purpose, developer uncontactable. Appears to be weighted towards heads. Have emailed developer, no reply.
